title: What are the best songs on mother in tamil? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can list a fewTamil film songs. Ammavendru azhaikkatha-------———————-——-———-Mannan Thayillamal naanillai-----------------------------------------——----—-Adimai penn Thayenum selvangal----—————————————————Moondru theivangal Annaiyai pol oru —————————————————-—-——Annaiyin aanai Annaiyin arule vaa--———————————————————Aadipperukku Amma amma neethan--------------------------------------——--—---Panakkaran Vetri meethu vetri---------------------------------------------——--------Thedi vantha maappillai Naanaga naanillai thaye----------------------------------——--—----Thoongathe thambi thoongathe Amma nee sumantha------------------------------------———-———Annai oor Aalayam Annaiyum thanthaiyum —————————————————-Haridas Thalattu paadi thayaga——————————————-—-——Praptham Deivame Deivame————————————————-————Deiva magan Chinna thayaval —————————————————————Thalapathi Thayin madiyil-----------------------------------------------------——------Thayin madiyil Petha manasu———————————————————-———Ennai petha rasa Ammanna summa-------------------------------------------------—--—-Thiruppu munai Unnai pola aatha-------------------------------——————————Ennai vittu pogaathe Anthinera thendral kaatru————————————————Inaintha kaigal Ulagam piranthathu------------------------------------------------—-—-Paasam Annamitta kaigalukku----------------------------------------------------Iru malargal Petredutha ullam----------------------------------------------------—-----Kanna nalama Thayenum sumaithangi------------------------------------------—-----Kaaviya thalaivi Oru naal iravu pagal pol---------------------------------—----——-—-Kaaviya thalaivi Naanagiya nathimoolame----------------------------------------------Viswaroopam2 Mazhai varuvathu---------------------------------------------------—-----Rishimoolam Nooru sami vanthalum---------------------------------------------——Pichaikkaaran Annai enbaval nee thana------------------------------------------------Annai Amma endraal anbu-----------———————————————Adimai Penn Ulagathil siranthathu ethu----------————————————-Pattinathil bootham Karuneela malai mele thai----------------------------------------------Thaye unakkaga Sollada vai thiranthu amma endru----------------------------——Neela vaanam There may be more such songs ,glorifying mother.
